mapper.select: SELECT a.USERS_NUMBER, r.reference_number, r.reference_title, a.users_name, r.reference_created_date, r.REFERENCE_CONTENT SELECT a.USERS_NUMBER, r.REFERENCE_NUMBER, r.reference_title, a.users_name, r.reference_created_date, r.REFERENCE_CONTENT FROM tbl_reference r JOIN ( SELECT u.users_number, c.users_name FROM tbl_users u JOIN tbl_care_users c ON u.users_number = c.users_number UNION SELECT u.users_number, n.users_name FROM tbl_users u JOIN tbl_normal_users n ON u.users_number = n.users_number) a ON r.REFERENCE_users_NUMBER = a.USERS_NUMBER WHERE a.users_number=#{usersNumber} AND r.REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{referenceNumber};
